content: this crochet pattern contains the written instructions for this hoop earring it is also available on my youtube channel for free you may sell the finished items you make using this pattern as long as you credit me as the original designer you may not share the pattern in parts or whole all images in the pattern are copyrighted by made with love by daisy if you have any queries about the pattern please reach out to me through ravelry instagram or email details in the pdf happy hooking daisy
